title: Can't log in - Unknown error
body:
I can't log in 9/10 times I just keep getting spammed by unknown errors, or it says login fail, i'm pretty much over it and it says to contact help.

Is there a way to fix this, how? 

(pretty sure its not my internet/modem because other mmo games work perfectly fine, never had problem with firewall before either)

replies.body:
Hey Talon

At what point during the login process do you get the errors?

* After you click "Launch"?
* After you enter your username & password?
* Is it the same error at the same point each time?

One action you could take is to try out the steps in the [Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) article on the support site.

Let me know how you go

Mindstar

Well, i did what was there, and then uninstalled and reinstalled the game, then did it again (to be sure) and that seemed to mostly work and i only get this around 1/10 times now, but when i start my queuing i am given 2 or 3 before the queue starts, then in the champion select im given a 5 or so second "retrieving data" load when i pick my first champ (every pick after that is fine). This is annoying, but much easier to handle than not being able to log in for 5 minute due to the spamming unknown errors.

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=95u56PMU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-08T00:20:00.922+0000)

>Let me know how you go

status: known
